# kCIInputPaletteImageKey

**Global Variable**

A key to get or set the palette image for a  Core Image filter.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIInputPaletteImageKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key needs to be a  1 pixel tall [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance.
title: kCIInputPaletteImageKey
